name: The unpredictability of the game
instruction:
![](https://course-qa-basics.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/section-2-course-5-task-8.png)
A tourist in Las Vegas started the game with some amount of money.

Create a variable `startMoney` and assign it a value greater than or equal to 100.

At the end of the game he lost some amount of money.

Create a variable `lostMoney` and give it a value between 50 and 80.

Create a variable `endMoney` and assign to it the calculated value of the remaining money as the difference between `startMoney` and `lostMoney`.

A similar example:
```javascript
const start = 55;
const lost = 10;
const end = start - 10;
```
